text:
[Verse]
Sun rises up high
Birds singing so fine
Life rushes on by
We dance without time

[Verse 2]
Footsteps in the sand
Wave crash on the land
Holding your warm hand
Feeling oh so grand

[Chorus]
Lost in the moment
Heartbeat's our token
Words left unspoken
In love's sweet ocean

[Verse]
Stars light up the night
Dreams taking their flight
Everything feels right
You're my guiding light

[Verse 2]
Laughter fills the air
No worries no care
Magic everywhere
A love we both share

[Chorus]
Lost in the moment
Heartbeat's our token
Words left unspoken
In love's sweet ocean
title: Lost in the Moment
